description:
http://anidb.net/ch8750 [Chagum]`s older brother. Cares deeply for http://anidb.net/ch8750 [Chagum]. When http://anidb.net/ch8750 [Chagum]`s belongings were ordered burned after http://anidb.net/ch8750 [Chagum] was presumed dead, Sagum took over the task to protect http://anidb.net/ch8750 [Chagum]`s things.
He dies from overwork in his responsibilities as Crown Prince before being able to see http://anidb.net/ch8750 [Chagum] alive again.
name: Sagum
